sourcesContent:
New Doctor

On adding a doctor, he will be approved to work in the hospital management by default
required field
Please enter full name of the doctor with initial
required field Invalid email Id
required field
Please enter 10 digit valid mobile number
required field
Should have a minimum experience of 3 years
required field
Please mention his/her specialization (eg: Cardiologist, Gynacologist)
required field
required field
Please mention proper donor address for reference purpose
required field
use "1234" as temporary password for now and inform doctor to update password later
Is he/she is an Authorized Doctor (adding proxy doctors is against to management's T&C !!!)
